spell_tooltip.description:
Stings the target, dealing 115,651 Nature damage and initiating a series of venoms. Each lasts 3 sec and applies the next effect after the previous one ends.

 Scorpid Venom:
90% reduced movement speed.

 Spider Venom:
Silenced.

 Viper Venom:
20% reduced damage and healing.

Throw a Sticky Tar Bomb that coats your target's weapons with tar, disarming them for 4 sec. 

After 4 sec, Sticky Tar Bomb explodes onto nearby enemies. Other enemies that are hit by the explosion are affected by Sticky Tar Bomb but this effect cannot spread further.
Aspect of the Cheetah has 50% reduced cooldown and grants its effects to allies within 15 yds.
Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.0 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 489,713 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
Maximum health increased by 8%, and Exhilaration now also heals you for an additional 12.0% of your maximum health over 8 sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 5%.

Kill Command has a 10% chance to grant Deathblow.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Your next Kill Shot can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.

Hurls a tar trap to the target location that creates a 8 yd radius pool of tar around itself for 30 sec when the first enemy approaches. All enemies have 50% reduced movement speed while in the area of effect. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

Removes 1 Enrage and 1 Magic effect from an enemy target.

Successfully dispelling an effect generates 10 Focus.
Reduces all damage you and your pet take by 30% for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting, preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Misdirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next attack within 30 sec and lasting for 8 sec.
Survival of the Fittest gains an additional charge.

Reduce the cooldown of Survival of the Fittest by 30 sec, and increase its duration by 2.0 sec.

Reduce the cooldown of Counter Shot and Muzzle by 2 sec.
Wildfire Bomb deals 10% increased damage.
When Tranquilizing Shot successfully dispels an effect or Muzzle interrupts a cast, gain 10 Focus.
Commands your pet to intimidate the target, stunning it for 5 sec.
Fires an explosive shot at your target. After 3 sec, the shot will explode, dealing 500,930 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yds. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Fires a magical projectile, tethering the enemy and any other enemies within 5 yds for 10 sec, stunning them for 4 sec if they move more than 5 yds from the arrow.
Fires an explosion of bolts at all enemies in front of you, knocking them back, snaring them by 50% for 6 sec, and dealing 5,485 Physical damage.

You and your pet have 5.0% increased attack speed.

This effect is increased by 100% if you do not have an active pet.
The damage of Explosive Shot is increased by 8%.
Critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Binding Shot's stun duration is increased by 1 sec.
Movement speed increased by 4%.
You and your pet blend into the surroundings and gain stealth for 1 min. While camouflaged, you will heal for 2% of maximum health every 1 sec.
You gain 5% more critical strike from critical strike sources.
Reduces the cooldowns of Aspect of the Eagle, Aspect of the Cheetah, and Aspect of the Turtle by 30 sec.
Feign Death and Aspect of the Turtle removes poison and disease effects from you.
Hurls a fire trap to the target location that explodes when an enemy approaches, causing 45,589 Fire damage and knocking all enemies up. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

Your damage over time effects deal 10% increased damage.

This effect is increased by 50% on targets below 20% health.

Give the command to kill, causing your pet to savagely deal 114,948 Physical damage to the enemy.

Kill Command has a 20% chance to immediately reset its cooldown.

Generates 15 Focus.

Hurl a bomb at the target, exploding for 192,491 Fire damage in a cone and coating enemies in wildfire, scorching them for 197,735 Fire damage over 6 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Deals 80% increased damage to your primary target.
A vicious slash dealing 414,167 Physical damage.
Wildfire Bomb now has 2 charges, and the initial explosion deals 50% increased damage.
Kill Command increases the direct damage of your other spells by 15%, stacking up to 3 times.
Auto-attacks with a two-handed weapon reduce the cooldown of Wildfire Bombs by 1.0 sec.
When you cast Kill Command, you have a 30% chance to fire an Arcane Shot at your target at 100% of normal value.

Kill Command has an additional 10% chance to immediately reset its cooldown.

Tip of the Spear's damage bonus is increased up to 30%, based on your critical strike chance.

Mongoose Bite and Raptor Strike have a 10% chance to reset Kill Command's cooldown.

Kill Command reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 0.5 sec.

Quick Shot and auto-attacks with a two-handed weapon increase the direct damage of your next Wildfire Bomb by 4%, stacking up to 3 times.

Casting Coordinated Assault grants 3 stacks of Wildfire Arsenal.

Attack all nearby enemies in a flurry of strikes, inflicting 328,758 Physical damage to nearby enemies and 258,932 damage over 8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Reduces the remaining cooldown on Wildfire Bomb by 3 sec for each target hit, up to 15.0 sec.
Kill Command now has 2 charges, and deals 15% increased damage.
Kill Shot, Serpent Sting, Arcane Shot, Steady Shot, and Explosive Shot deal 20% increased damage.

Wildfire Bomb deals 5% increased damage and has a 25% chance to reset the cooldown of Explosive Shot.

Explosive Shot reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 2 sec.

Flanking Strike damage increased by 40% and Flanking Strike now increases your attack speed by 25% for 12 sec.

Butchery reduces the remaining cooldown on Wildfire Bomb by 3.0 sec for each target hit, up to 5 targets.

Enemies damaged by Flanking Strike bleed for an additional 517,864 damage over 8 sec.

Up to 5 enemies damaged by Butchery bleed for an additional 258,932 damage over 8 sec.

Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite damage increased by 15%.

Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite apply Serpent Sting to your target.

Serpent Sting
Fire a poison-tipped arrow at an enemy, dealing 32,864 Nature damage instantly and an additional 221,148 damage over 12 sec.

Kill Command causes the target to bleed for 31,477 damage over 8 sec.

You and your pet gain 10% attack speed for every bleeding enemy within 12 yds.
Damage of Flanking Strike and Butchery increased by 5% and all damage dealt by Wildfire Bomb increased by 5%.
Reapplying Serpent Sting to a target also spreads it to up to 4 enemies within 8 yds.
Each damage over time effect on a target increases the critical strike damage they receive from you by 2%.
Wildfire Bomb and Explosive Shot damage increased by 10.0%.
Raptor Strike, Mongoose Bite, and Butchery damage increased by 10%.

Furiously strikes all enemies in front of you, dealing 2.4 million Physical damage over 2.9 sec. Critical strike chance increased by 50% against any target below 20% health. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You and your pet charge your enemy, striking them for a combined 328,221 Physical damage. You and your pet's bond is then strengthened for 20 sec, causing you and your pet to deal 20% increased damage.

While Coordinated Assault is active, Kill Command's chance to reset its cooldown is increased by 15%.

Fury of the Eagle's damage is increased by 10% and has a 20% chance to generate a stack of Tip of the Spear.

When Fury of the Eagle ends, your Haste is increased by 8%.
The cooldown of Coordinated Assault is reduced by 60 sec and Coordinated Assault now grants 3 stacks of Tip of the Spear.

When you cast Coordinated Assault, you gain 1 charge of Wildfire Bomb. 

When Coordinated Assault ends, Explosive Shot's cooldown is reset and your next Explosive Shot fires at 2 additional targets at 100% effectiveness.

Your attacks have a chance to apply Sentinel on the target, stacking up to 10 times.

While Sentinel stacks are higher than 3, applying Sentinel has a chance to trigger an implosion, causing a stack to be consumed on the target every sec to deal 80,506 Arcane damage.
Each time Sentinel deals damage to an enemy you gain an absorb shield equal to 1.0% of your maximum health, up to 10%.
When you apply Sentinel to a target not affected by Sentinel, you apply 1 additional stack.
Raptor Strike, Mongoose Bite and Wildfire Bomb deal 10% increased damage.
When you apply Sentinel on a target, you have a 15% chance to apply a second stack.
When Sentinel starts dealing damage, the target is snared by 40% for 3 sec.

Each time Sentinel deals damage to an enemy it has an up to 15% chance to generate 5 Focus.

Chances decrease with each additional Sentinel currently imploding applied to enemies.
For 8 sec after activating Coordinated Assault, all abilities are guaranteed to apply Sentinel.
Multi-Shot and Butchery discharge arcane energy from all targets affected by your Sentinel, dealing 92,535 Arcane damage to up to 5 targets within 8 yds of your Sentinel targets.

All Sentinel debuffs implode when a target affected by more than 3 stacks of your Sentinel falls below 20% health.

This effect can only occur once every 15 sec per target.

Every 30 sec your next Wildfire Bomb launches a celestial arrow that conjures a 12 yd radius Lunar Storm at the target's location dealing 102,817 Arcane damage.
 
For the next 12 sec, a random enemy affected by Sentinel within your Lunar Storm gets struck for 96,391 Arcane damage every 0.4 sec. Any target struck by this effect takes 10% increased damage from you and your pet for 8 sec.
Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.0 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 495,692 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.

Coordinated Assault sends you and your pet into a state of primal power. For the duration of Coordinated Assault, Kill Command generates 2 additional stack of Tip of the Spear, you gain 10% Haste, and Tip of the Spear's damage bonus is increased by 50%.
The cooldown of Spearhead is reduced by 30 sec and Spearhead's bleed now increases you and your pet's critical strike damage against the target by 30%.

Howl of the Pack Leader causes your Kill Command to generate an additional stack of Tip of the Spear.

Summoning a Beast reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 10.0 sec.

Kill Command reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 2.0 sec.

Raptor Strike reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 1.0 sec.

Howl of the Pack Leader's cooldown is reduced to 25 sec.

Your pets gain an extra 5% of your attack power.
Your Bear's periodic damage has a 10% chance to reduce the cooldown of Butchery or Flanking Strike by 2.0 sec.

Summoning your Boar refreshes the duration of Mongoose Fury.

Each time your Boar deals damage, you have a 25% chance to gain a stack of Mongoose Fury and Raptor Strike strikes 1 additional target. Stacks up to 4 times.

Mongoose Fury
Increases the damage of Mongoose Bite or Raptor Strike by 15% for 16 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

When dropping below 60% health, summon the aid of a Turtle, reducing the damage you take by 10% for 6 sec.

This effect can only occur once every 1.5 min.
